meta.title: AI-Bet v5.1 — Bendigo R3 (1600 m Soft 5)
notes: Scoring uses: barrier bias, soft-track modifier, 1600 m fitness, weight impact (>60kg), Euro/NZ stamina bonus.
Bookmaker odds are shown only for comparison; no odds were used in the model scoring.

predictions.notes: Strong 2nd-up fitness, proven 1600m, Euro (So You Think NZ) +0.30, minor weight penalty 62kg.
Recent form 1st–3rd, solid Good record, Euro (Dundeel NZ) +0.30, strong momentum off 35-day let-up.
Distance specialist 1600m (9:2-0-2), solid fitness, mild Euro dam GB +0.10, small overlay opportunity.
Barrier 3 ideal, distance record 13:4-1-1, strong Good track stats (22:5-0-2), volatile form cycle.

next_best.notes: Barrier 1 + Euro sire Cable Bay (IRE) +0.20, second-up improvement expected.
Third-up and fitter, consistent at Bendigo, potential place value.
